```{r}
#Figure 3
library(mgcv)
library(ggplot2)

# as factor
masterdf$sex<-as.factor(masterdf$sex)
model<-gam(g~s(cbcl_scr_syn_totprob_r,sex,bs="fs",k=5),data=masterdf)
# plot it
mycol <- c("blue", "pink")
mylty <- c(1, 2)

# Plot the GAM with different colors and line types for each level of 'sex'
plot.gam(model, se = TRUE, col = mycol, lty = mylty)

# Add legend to the plot
legend("topleft", legend = levels(masterdf$sex), col = mycol, lty = mylty)


```
